snippet: A federal appeals court upheld California’s transportation fuel standards, which are designed to help reduce greenhouse gas emissions from fuel to 1990 levels by 2020.
abstract: Federal appeals court upholds California's transportation fuel standards, which are designed to help reduce greenhouse gas emissions from fuel to 1990 levels by 2020.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court upheld California’s transportation fuel standards, which are designed to help reduce greenhouse gas emissions from fuel to 1990 levels by 2020.
